solver.search.strategy.strategy

Class AbstractStrategy<V extends Variable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.strategy.strategy.AbstractStrategy<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityBased, DomOverWDeg, FindAndProve, GenerateAndTest, ImpactBased, IntStrategy, LastConflict, LastConflict_old, ObjectiveStrategy, RealStrategy, SetStrategy, StrategiesSequencer

    public abstract class AbstractStrategy<V extends Variable>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An AbstractStrategy does not implicitly advance to the next decision on getDecision() (or getOppositeDecision()) invokation.
    See also Gamma et al. "Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software", Behavioral patterns : Command, Iterator. todo: comment
    Since:
    1 juil. 2010
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public abstract Decision<V> getDecision()
